name: Super Evolution Illustrated: War World
summary: Super Evolution Illustrated adopts a unique multi-choice evolution mechanism, which can customize the evolution direction of Digimon. Each Digimon can break through the upper limit and achieve ultimate combat power. Here, Digimon are not just companions in battle, they also have their own stories. Here, a new adventure in your name is about to begin. Be the next to be called and go now!
